channel.title: wifi on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in wifi on Barefoot Rob

item.title: in airport with NO WIFI OMG
item.description: 09:02 Sunday 24 December 2017 -03 Hafta give up phone number or Facebook credentials in order to get (free) wifi in Fortaleza airport, so I have no wifi now. Kinda stucks because I want to send an email to Fred and reply to Kai’s email to me.

item.title: The fifth cheesecake
item.description: 11:57 Monday 24 July 2017 JST About once a week I eat lunch at Wired Cafe in Lazona. I always order the same thing (salad pizza, unsliced), sit in the same place (near an electrical outlet), and joke around with the manager when he is in. One time I busted out my Japanese and ordered five (5) cheesecake sundaes. チーズケーキいつつお願いします。 and he was like five?? And I was like haha just joking.

item.title: I'm thinking of getting mobile wifi
item.description: 11:22 Tuesday 14 June 2016 JST to use for work and shit while I’m commuting, cause I’m not able to go home as often as I could in previous house.

item.title: tried to login to family mart free wifi
item.description: 18:20 Thursday 14 May 2015 JST but couldn’t quite figure it out for sure. I think I have to click the link in email they sent…
